San_Marcos.San Marcos Baptist Academy: San Marcos Academy or SMA (also known as San Marcos Baptist Academy or SMBA) is a coed prep school that is affiliated with the Baptist General Convention of Texas and accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools and the Texas Association of Boarding Schools. The Academy was founded in 1907; its mission is to educate young men and women within a nurturing community based upon Christian values. The Academy accepts boarding and day students in grades 6–12.
